name: Big Parasol
rules: As long as the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot, prevent all effects of attacks from your opponent's Pokémon done to all of your Pokémon. (Existing effects are not removed. Damage is not an effect.)

name: Billowing Smoke
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, that player discards any Prize cards they would take for that Knock Out instead of putting those cards into their hand.

name: Bird Keeper
rules: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, draw 3 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Cape of Toughness
rules: The Basic Pokémon this card is attached to gets +50 HP, except Pokémon-GX.

name: Familiar Bell
rules: Search your deck for a Pokémon with the same name as a Pokémon in your discard pile, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Glimwood Tangle
rules: Once during each player's turn, after that player flips any coins for an attack, they may ignore all results of those coin flips and begin flipping those coins again.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Kabu
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 4 cards. If your Active Pokémon is your only Pokémon in play, draw 8 cards instead.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Old PC
rules: Flip 2 coins. If both are heads, put a card from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Piers
rules: Search your deck for an Energy card and a Darkness Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Pokémon Breeder's Nurturing
rules: Choose up to 2 of your Pokémon in play. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a card that evolves from that Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck. You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Rare Fossil
rules: Play this card as if it were a 70-HP Basic Colorless Pokémon. At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play.This card can't be affected by any Special Conditions, and it can't retreat.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rose
rules: Attach up to 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon VMAX. If you attached any Energy cards in this way, discard your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Rose Tower
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may draw cards until they have 3 cards in their hand.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Spikemuth
rules: Whenever a player's Active Pokémon moves to the Bench during their turn, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Struggle Gloves
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to has Weakness to your opponent's Active Pokémon's type, its attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Turbo Patch
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Basic Pokémon that isn't a Pokémon-GX.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Yell Horn
rules: Both Active Pokémon are now Confused.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

rules: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Fire Energy.The Fire Pokémon this card is attached to gets +20 HP.

name: Hiding Darkness Energy
rules: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Darkness Energy.The Darkness Pokémon this card is attached to has no Retreat Cost.

abilities.text: If all of your Pokémon in play are Darkness type, you can have up to 8 Pokémon on your Bench, and you can't put non-Darkness Pokémon into play. (If this Ability stops working, discard Pokémon from your Bench until you have 5.)

attacks.name: Dread End
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Darkness Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Hard Scissors
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Sonic Double
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Max Wings
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Max Wings.

name: Pokémon Breeder's Nurturing
rules: Choose up to 2 of your Pokémon in play. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a card that evolves from that Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck. You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Rose
rules: Attach up to 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon VMAX. If you attached any Energy cards in this way, discard your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

abilities.name: Voltage Beat
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Grass Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

abilities.name: Tar Generator
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Fire Energy card, a Fighting Energy card, or 1 of each from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like.

name: Big Parasol
rules: As long as the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot, prevent all effects of attacks from your opponent's Pokémon done to all of your Pokémon. (Existing effects are not removed. Damage is not an effect.)

name: Turbo Patch
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Basic Pokémon that isn't a Pokémon-GX.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Capture Energy
rules: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Colorless Energy.When you attach this card from your hand to a Pokémon, search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
